titleStmt.title: A new yeares gyfte more precious than golde worthy to be embrased no lesse ioyfully than tha[n]kfully of euery true christe[n] man, newly published by Theodore Basille.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Botulphe lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Iohn̄ Mayler for Iohn̄ Gough,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The newe yeres gyfte.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of the whyte Beare
